title: Dating With Diabetes
itunes:title: Dating With Diabetes
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 55 year old divorced woman and I met a handsome, slightly older gentleman online. We have a lot of things in common and I found out we know a lot of the same folks. Since my divorce, I’ve put on a few pounds here and there but he doesn’t seem to mind it. When we first started dating in January, I had to spend a few days in the hospital and he called me daily to check on me. He’s a church going man and he’s a sharp dresser. There is just one problem that I have with him and it’s the way he eats................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
